description:
Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math and Music the Duolingo way!  

Build real-world math skills – from calculating tips to identifying patterns – and sharpen your mental math in our Math course.

Learn how to read music and play familiar songs on your device in our Music course – no instrument required.

Whether you’re learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters keep you motivated to build solid skills across language, math and music.

• Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. And now, learn Math and Music with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo:

“Far and away the best language-learning app.” –The Wall Street Journal

“This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges – speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions – that keep me coming back for more.” –The New York Times

“Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.” – TIME Magazine

“…Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun…” - Forbes

“Our favorite language app…” - CNET

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

If you choose to purchase Super Duolingo, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.duolingo.com/terms

developer: HELLOTALK FOREIGN LANGUAGE EXCHANGE LEARNING TALK CHAT APP
description:
Practice languages with native speakers on HelloTalk! We recently introduced HelloTalk Live and Voiceroom - interactive language and culture events to help you master languages through the content you love! 

HelloTalk, the original language exchange app, connects you with native speakers to practice languages (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese and 160+ more) for FREE! 

HelloTalk equips you with learning tools such as translation and instant captions so you can learn by chatting with native speakers. Learn languages from locals around the world through livestreams and Voicerooms. Connect with expert hosts to discuss interesting topics with language partners in the learning community! 

Why HelloTalk? 

► Real language learning atmosphere 
Whether you're focused on a widely spoken language or a less common one, HelloTalk caters to your needs. The system smartly matches you based on your native language and proficiency, while allowing you to filter ideal language partners according to various criteria such as age, location, and gender. Plus, with built-in translation and transliteration tools, you can communicate confidently without any language barriers.

► A powerful tool for sharpening your language skills
Acquiring new words through conversations with native speakers is more effective than rigid memorization. Whether you're a student preparing for exams like the CET, GRE, TOEFL, IELTS, planning to study abroad, or a professional seeking career advancement through language skills, HelloTalk offers native speakers who match your proficiency level for engaging interactions and valuable learning experiences.

► Immersive multi-person language chat rooms
If you choose to learn Spanish, for example, every Voiceroom you enter on HelloTalk gathers Spanish learners and Spanish native speakers from around the world to discuss interesting topics. Here, only your voice needs to be heard, creating a comfortable, introvert-friendly atmosphere. Here, sharing mutual interests allows everyone to freely express themselves and share personal experiences, fostering both language intuition and authentic expression skills. It's incredibly addictive!

► Diverse global Livestreams
HelloTalk features handpicked foreign language hosts who offer online video lessons, share language insights, and provide glimpses into their lives abroad. You can even join them on stage for one-on-one video conversations with fellow language learners. Whether you're grappling with pronunciation, speaking speed, or shyness, these hosts will assist you in refining your language skills and guiding the conversation. For rapid improvement in spoken language, there's no substitute for direct communication with native speakers!

► International Moments
HelloTalk's Moments offers real-time posts covering learning, lifestyle, and cultural insights from around the world. It's your ticket to discovering fresh perspectives and gaining deeper insights into diverse cultural customs, all from the comfort of your home. Don't forget to engage with posts that catch your interest!

What the world is saying about HelloTalk
“One of the best apps to help you learn a new language.” - 9to5Mac 
"When you're ready to experiment with a foreign language, HelloTalk provides an excellent opportunity for interaction with other speakers." –PCMag 
"HelloTalk, which connects native speakers with an apprentice, also offers language exchanges to its 20 million users in more than 150 languages." -Forbes 

START PRACTICING LANGUAGES RIGHT AWAY!!!

Learn more about the HelloTalk app: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hellotalk/ 
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/hellotalkapp 

Send any feedback to support@hellotalk.com 
- Privacy Policy: https://www.hellotalk.com/privacy-policy 
- Terms of Use: https://www.hellotalk.com/terms-of-service

SAYA helps people in Myanmar to learn English and Japanese in a simple and fun way. 

The app offers video lessons with practice for all levels, plus extra features like bite-sized videos, micro reading lessons, flashcards, level tests, and character writing practice for Japanese. 

You can also join live and conversational classes to improve speaking skills. Every lesson is easy to follow, with fun practice to help you learn better.

---- Download SAYA application now ----

Want to learn languages and shadowing through videos and podcasts you love? Try Miraa!

Audio and video bilingual subtitle transcription, real-time translation, and AI assistance to navigate the challenging section.

All of these services are now available in multiple languages, including:
- English
- Japanese
- Chinese
- Korean
- Spanish
- German
- Italian
- French

Echo Method
In Miraa, you can easily learn languages through four steps: "Listen" "Understand" "Imitate" and "Compare." Just like playing a mimicry game, it helps you learn languages more effectively, enhancing your linguistic intuition and listening skills.

Real-time Translation
Miraa's real-time translation feature allows you to understand subtitles instantly, whether you're watching movies or listening to podcasts. Learning languages and understanding cultures has never been easier.

AI Interpretation
Stuck on something you don't understand? No worries, Miraa's AI interpretation helps you grasp every word and grammar rule in depth. Chatting with AI makes learning languages so easy and fun.

Terms of use:  https://miraa.app/terms/usage.html
Privacy Policy: https://miraa.app/terms/privacy-policy.html

Hi, and welcome to Toca Boca World! It’s the ultimate universe for kids to play, design, and explore their endless imaginations. This isn't just a game, it's a safe space where every story is yours to create, and the fun never stops.

Toca Boca World is where creativity takes centre stage:
• Unleash your inner storyteller: Roleplay in a universe you've created, where you can tell your own stories. Become a teacher, a vet, or even an influencer.
• Design your dream world: Bring your best friends to life with Character Creator. Customise hair, faces, and accessories to make up your own style! Use the intuitive Home Designer tool, and you're the architect! Decorate your own house, supermarket, campervan, or any of our constantly updated locations with the furniture and colours you love.
• Explore and discover a game of secrets and surprises: Find hundreds of hidden gems in the game! From jewels and crumpets to unlocking secret rooms, there’s always something new and exciting to uncover.
• Fresh content, always: Toca Boca World is an endless universe that keeps growing! Discover new locations and content updated every month, there's always more to explore.
• Friday is gift day! Pop into the Post Office to collect the gifts we’ve sent you on the conveyor belt, including decorations, furniture, and even pets! Keep an eye out for Gift Bonanzas where we give away a LOT of items from previous years.

More than 60 million girls and boys play on Toca Boca World, the very first game of its kind – that's a LOT of kid-testers making sure the fun never ends!
• Press play! Download Toca Boca World now and dive into an endlessly fun universe. Furnish your first apartment in Bop City, buy housewarming items for your Free Family House and don’t forget to get your hair done before the party with characters you’ve created!
• Expand your world: You can build a bigger Toca Boca World with all the stuff available in the in-app shop! Play your best influencer life in the Megastar Mansion, take care of animals in the pet hospital, or just relax in Bubble Bop Spa with your friends!
• A safe and secure play environment: At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play above all else. Toca Boca World is a single-player kids’ game, COPPA compliant, and designed as a secure platform where you can explore, create, and play freely without interruptions. That’s our promise to you!
• Award-winning fun: Recognised as App of the Year 2021 and an Editor's Choice, Toca Boca World is praised for its quality and dedication to kids’ safety, and continues to evolve to be better and better!
• No ads, ever: Toca Boca World will never show third-party ads. We’ll never interrupt your game with adverts. Play always comes first!
• About us: Our fun, award-winning kids’ game can be downloaded on phones, tablets and computers for free. We also offer in-app purchases for our most dedicated fans, which allows us to build a game with a focus on quality that is completely ad-free and 100% safe. We take privacy very seriously, learn more at https://tocaboca.com/privacy.

• Stay connected! Discover our latest updates and collaborations by following us on social media:
https://www.instagram.com/tocaboca/
https://www.youtube.com/@tocaboca
https://www.tiktok.com/@tocaboca?lang=en-GB

Quality useful application that helps to translate words into English or Burmese with one touch. Perfect for schoolchildren, teachers, students, adults, travellers and for anyone who is interested in studying foreign languages. 

It is a translation tool that helps you break down language barriers. Excellent app for all who makes the first steps in learning Burmese. Intuitive interface, easy navigation, quick result. Begin conversations confidently!

Learn Japanese in context - READING, LISTENING, SPEAKING and JLPT

With more than 10 fresh news articles daily, you can practice at your own level, from N5 beginner to N1 advanced. Improve your reading skills, expand your vocabulary, and understand Japanese the way natives use it. 

Why choose Todaii Japanese to learn Japanese?

* Major update:
Todaii Japanese launches the new “Tomo Chat” – Practice speak Japanese with AI
Outstanding features:
- Chat with AI about real, context-rich news content. This allows learners to practice language reflexes in realistic situations, stay updated on social topics, and develop flexible language thinking - something traditional learning topics often lack.
- Summary of errors and suggestions for correction.

Reading practice - Learn Japanese through real content
- Improve Japanese reading skills with content selected from levels N5 to N1
- Topics include Japanese culture, daily life, technology, entertainment, and more.
- Integrated 1-touch lookup right in the reading, helping you deeply understand the semantics of words and sentences when needed.
- Practice with Quiz to help consolidate skills and memorize lesson content
- Practice reading and pronunciation of each word, each sentence

A.I. Pronunciation Scoring - Improve your pronunciation, speak Japanese confidently
- Recognize and analyze your pronunciation of each word using A.I. technology
- Compare with native pronunciation to detect mistakes
- Provide accurate scores after each practice to track progress

Practice real-life conversations - Learn to speak Japanese naturally
- 72 conversations, helping you quickly learn basic communication in Japanese used daily.
- Learn Japanese grammar with each conversation.
- Designed for learners who want to learn to speak Japanese with confidence.

Japanese Dictionary - Easy lookup and learn Japanese vocabulary
- Smart, fast, and accurate dictionary similar to top Japanese dictionary apps
- Look up vocabulary, idioms, sentence structures, and grammar breakdowns.
- All features are designed to help you learn Japanese vocabulary and grammar naturally.

JLPT N5-N1 mock test - Learn Japanese for exam success
- Full mock tests to help you prepare for the JLPT exam in July and December.
- Detailed explanations of answers help you understand and improve your weaknesses.
- 356 JLPT N5-N1 reading practice exercises

Listening practice - Learn Japanese by listening to native video
- Practice listening skills through hot videos and podcasts, with transcripts to help you understand each sentence.
- Audio with reading exercises to practice listening skills with high-quality voices
- Easily adjust playback speed, suitable for each learner's level
- Attractive videos and podcasts, help you practice listening skills, supplement vocabulary and grammar in real contexts.
- Detailed transcripts included, easy to follow lesson content.

Vocabulary - Learn and remember Japanese words faster
- Vocabulary curated and summarized from real reading passages.
- Easy-to-use Flashcards to memorize new words.
- Full JLPT N5-N1 vocabulary list for targeted learning.

Application for:
- People who want to learn Japanese from scratch or improve existing skills.
- Self-learners who want to study Japanese effectively at home.
- Learners preparing for the JLPT N5-N1 exams.
- Anyone looking to enhance their Japanese reading, listening, and speaking abilities.

Whether you're just starting or already have some experience, Todaii Japanese is your trusted app to learn Japanese in a fun, structured, and effective way

Let Todaii Japanese be your companion on your journey to learn Japanese and connect deeply with the language and culture of Japan!

For feedback or questions, contact us at: todai.easylife@gmail.com
 Your support helps us make Todaii Japanese better every day.

* For more information, please visit:
https://easyjapanese.net/terms
https://easyjapanese.net/privacy-policy

developer: Shanghai Yuxuan Information Technology Co. , Ltd
description:
SuperChinese is the world's leading Mandarin Chinese learning app, based on Artificial Intelligence. It can satisfy the needs of any user, from a beginner with zero experience to a professional, and provides an easy and effective method to master the language of Mandarin Chinese.


Hello Chinese learners, learn Chinese faster with SuperChinese!
All the Best Language Learning Approaches Integrated Into 1 Super App


Powered By AI
Spaced Repetition: Remember Effortlessly
Animated Videos: Conceptualize Faster
Thematic Lessons: Understand Context
Complete Fluency: Speak Chinese, Read Chinese, Write Characters and Improve your Chinese Listening
Gamification: Enjoy Learning Chinese


For basic Chinese learners, we cover Pinyin (think of it as the Chinese alphabet!), so you can learn how to speak and improve your Chinese pronunciation. Beginner Chinese language learners will find it easy to start learning their target language with SuperChinese. It’s simple to learn Chinese characters, vocabulary, and essential phrases. SuperChinese makes learning Chinese easy.

Features that make learning Mandarin Chinese simple!

Expertly crafted for your success
SuperChinese uses advanced AI technology to meet your personal learning style. Lessons are drawn from a wide range of real-life topics, and presented in a way that sticks.

No need for a language tutor, our Chinese lessons are built to cover all aspects of learning a new language: speaking, reading, writing, and listening. Are you a beginner? Start with Chinese pinyin.

Don’t worry about memorization, focus on what matters, and our app will do the rest. Language learning made easy!


AI-based proficiency Test: Your Chinese test
A unique and precise way to know your exact Chinese level. Customize your learning experience and set yourself on the path to complete Chinese fluency. From basic Chinese to advanced Chinese, with our free level test, you’ll always start at the right level.


Bite-Sized Lessons: Learning Chinese is easy
Learning built around your busy schedule. Each lesson takes about 10-15 minutes to complete, keep your streak going. It only takes a little time every day to improve your Chinese skills.


Speech Recognition: Speak Chinese fluently
Speak like a native. Pronounce words in the right tone and understand their contextual meaning in daily conversations. SuperChinese offers you a faster way to speak Chinese. Struggling with learning Mandarin pronunciation? Your AI language tutor lets you know where you need to improve. It isn’t only for Chinese vocab, but also Chinese phrases!


Animated Thematic Videos: Top Chinese content

Conceptualize faster with the help of animated videos and visual stories. Create a lasting mental picture. We understand it’s not easy to learn a foreign language, so we’ve created videos with real dialogue that you can use in a Chinese conversation anytime. It’s fun and easy!


Quality Content: easy Chinese lessons

Enjoy over 400 Lessons, split into 9 Chinese levels and based on more than 50 interesting themes. Remember effortlessly through AI-powered spaced repetition. Learn Chinese systematically, from basic Chinese to advanced Chinese, we have the right content for all Chinese language learners.


Go All the Way with SuperChinese +
Accelerate your path to fluency, master Mandarin Chinese faster


We have six types of subscriptions:
PLUS for 1 month: 88 RMB
PLUS for 12 months: 488 RMB
PLUS for Lifetime: 998 RMB

CHAO for 1 month: 168RMB
CHAO for 6 months: 658RMB
CHAO for 12 months: 898RMB

《SuperChinese User terms》https://api.superchinese.com/app/protocol
《SuperChinese subscription renewal terms》https://api.superchinese.com/app/autorenew-protocol

SPEAK CONFIDENTLY, LIVE MORE

Invest in your future today. Learn Chinese faster using artificial intelligence. Join over a million Chinese learners and download the SuperChinese APP today!

Make screen time more meaningful with Khan Academy Kids—the award-winning, educational app for kids ages 2–8. Packed with fun, standards-aligned reading games, math games, phonics lessons, and interactive storybooks, the app has helped over 21 million preschool and elementary students learn at home, at school, and on the go. Join Kodi the Bear and friends on exciting educational adventures that spark curiosity, build confidence, and inspire a lifelong love of learning. 

PLAY-BASED READING, MATH & MORE:
From ABC games and phonics practice to counting, addition, and shapes, kids can explore over 5,000 educational games and activities with Kodi’s friends:
• Ollo the Elephant – phonics and letter sounds
• Reya the Red Panda – storytime and writing
• Peck the Hummingbird – numbers and counting
• Sandy the Dingo – puzzles, memory, and problem-solving

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION:
With more than 180,000 5-star reviews, Khan Academy Kids has won the hearts of families and educators worldwide. 
• “Best kids app EVER”
• “It’s 100% free and my kids learn so much!”
• “If you’re looking for a HIGH quality app for your kids, this is it!”

Recognition includes:
• Common Sense Media – Top Rated Educational App
• Children’s Technology Review – Editor’s Choice
• Parents’ Choice – Gold Award Winner
• Apple App Store – Editor’s Choice

A LIBRARY OF STORYBOOKS AND VIDEOS:
• Discover hundreds of kids’ books and videos for preschool, kindergarten and early elementary.
• Explore animals, dinosaurs, science, and more with non-fiction books from National Geographic and Bellwether Media. 
• Choose “Read To Me” for read-aloud storybooks in English or Spanish. 
• Dance and sing-along with videos from Super Simple Songs! 

FROM PRESCHOOL TO 2ND GRADE:
Khan Academy Kids grows with your child, from age 2 through 8 and beyond:
• Preschool learning games build foundational reading, math, and life skills.
• Kindergarten activities cover phonics, sight words, writing, and early math.
• 1st and 2nd grade lessons strengthen reading comprehension, problem-solving, and confidence.

SAFE, TRUSTED, AND ALWAYS FREE:
Created in partnership with the Stanford Graduate School of Education by education experts, aligned with Head Start and Common Core Standards, COPPA-compliant, and 100% free—no ads, no subscriptions. Khan Academy is a nonprofit with the mission to provide a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.

LEARN ANYWHERE—AT HOME, AT SCHOOL, EVEN OFFLINE:
• At home: Khan Academy Kids is the perfect learning app for families at home. From sleepy mornings to road trips, kids and families love learning with Khan Kids. 
For homeschool: Families that homeschool also enjoy our standards-aligned, educational kids games and lessons for kids.
• At school: In-app Teacher Tools help preschool and elementary school teachers create assignments, track student progress, and make the most of small-group and whole-group learning.
• On the go: No wifi? No problem! Download books and games for learning on the go. Perfect for car trips, waiting rooms, or cozy mornings at home.

START YOUR LEARNING ADVENTURE TODAY
Download Khan Academy Kids and watch your child discover, play, and grow. 

JOIN OUR COMMUNITIES FOR FAMILIES AND TEACHERS
Follow @khankids on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. 

KHAN ACADEMY:
Khan Academy is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization with the mission to provide a free, world-class education to anyone, anywhere. Khan Academy Kids was created by early learning experts from Duck Duck Moose who created 22 preschool games and won 22 Parents’ Choice Awards, 19 Children’s Technology Review Awards and a KAPi award for Best Children’s App. Khan Academy Kids is 100% free with no ads or subscriptions.

Plant Identifier – Plant Snap

Identify plants in seconds. Diagnose diseases, get expert care tips, and manage your garden with ease.

Turn your phone into a powerful plant identifier app and personal garden assistant. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced plant lover, Plant Identifier – Plant Snap helps you recognize and care for any plant effortlessly.

FEATURES

Accurate Plant Identification
Take a photo or upload one from your gallery to instantly identify plants, flowers, trees and leaves with high precision. Perfect for houseplants and outdoor discoveries.

Plant Disease Diagnosis
Is your plant showing signs of stress or illness? Get instant results with the built-in plant disease identifier and receive expert care recommendations.

Smart Plant Care Reminders
Never forget to water, mist, or fertilize. Set personalized plant care reminders to keep every plant in top condition.

Virtual Garden Collection
Track all your plants in one place. Add photos, care notes, and set custom reminders to manage your indoor or outdoor garden efficiently.

Expert Plant Care Guides
Access reliable plant care tips, beginner gardening advice, and expert articles to help your plants thrive year-round.

Identify from Camera or Gallery
Use your camera to capture live images or upload from your phone to get instant identification and plant information.

WHY CHOOSE PLANT IDENTIFIER – PLANT SNAP?

- Identify over 30,000+ plant species using AI
- Diagnose common plant diseases with photo-based analysis
- Get accurate watering and fertilizing advice
- Stay on schedule with care reminders and notifications
- Organize your garden and track every plant in your collection
- Ideal for houseplants, herbs, flowers, trees, and wild plants

Whether you're exploring nature or managing a collection at home, Plant Identifier – Plant Snap is your complete tool for identification, diagnosis, and plant care.

Download Plant Identifier – Plant Snap now and make plant care simple.

ABC Run Game: Learn, Match, and Discover
Step into the world of Endless Alphabet ABC Game, now reimagined with brand-new educational mini games! This ultimate Learn ABC Educational Game keeps the fun going—without the running—by blending interactive play with ABCD Alphabet Letter Learning in fresh and exciting ways.
What’s New in ABC Run Game?

Smart Mini Games
Explore a collection of learning mini games designed to boost early skills. Match shadows, pair items, and solve fun puzzles that reinforce letter recognition, logic, and observation.

Vehicle Adventures
Drive colorful vehicles to pick up letters, animals, and birds. Collect ABC letters while discovering the sounds, names, and fun facts about what you pick up—turning playtime into an exciting learning mission.

Alphabet Exploration
Continue the Alphabet Adventure by collecting letters from A to Z in creative new ways—matching, driving, and tapping your way to learning success.

Vibrant and Engaging World
Bright visuals, cheerful music, and interactive scenes make each moment feel magical—perfect for sparking curiosity in young learners.

In this app, users can buy or order course by leaving their phone number. The customer service will contact that user and give a activation code for ordered course.

Are you looking for an effective way to sound more confident in IELTS interviews or real-life conversations with Natives?

Do you want to build stronger vocabulary to understand fast native speakers and want to giving detailed and fluent answers during IELTS speaking tasks?

If yes, then look no further than HalaEnglish – Your all-in-one English learning app!! Train and improve your English speaking and listening skills for daily communication. Build strong vocabulary to express your ideas in writing and speaking tasks for your IELTS exam.

When we started and why HalaEnglish was needed?

HalaEnglish was launched in 2022 with on clear mission: to bridge the gap between English learners and real-world fluency. In Vietnam, we spent years memorizing grammar rules and vocabulary but when it came to speak, our minds went blank. Like so many learners we were afraid of mistakes too and we had no one to practice with. We could read and write easily, but real conversation always felt out of reach.

Everything changed when we started practicing English daily instead of chasing perfection. Slowly and gradually, we improved and confidence replaced fear. This journey inspired us to create HalaEnglish – an app build by learners for learners. A place where you practice with smart AI partners without the fear of judgement.

Brief Introduction to HalaEnglish:
First of all, we warmly welcome all iPhone and iPad users to the smart English learning platform. A place where you will practice real-life English every day to improve your pronunciation and grow your confidence of speaking.

Unlike other apps, HalaEnglish helps you speak, write, and think more fluently with your daily learning and practicing.

+ Improve all four English skills: Listening, Speaking, Reading, and Writing

+ Practice vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation with detailed structured lessons

+ Take part in quizzes and topic-based exercises designed to improve English like natives

+ Engage with your AI Companion – Get feedback to improve your weak points and build more confident English

Preparing for the IETLS exam?

Improve your English skills to meet B1 or C2 level language requirements. Write better and accurate essays with the help of detailed grammar explanation and quick grammar fixes. Learn useful-words packs to talk as much as you want. Whether you want to achieve a 6.5 to 8.0 Band in IELTS or just want to speak fluently like natives, HalaEnglish has got you covered. Engage with the role-play chat and improve your vocabulary with guess-the-word game.


Main Features of HalaEnglish:

+ Interactive Roleplay: Practice real-life conversations to naturally understand and learn the use of new words

+ Flashcard Guessing Game: Strengthen your memory and recall essential vocabulary quickly with fun and interactive challenges

+ Pronunciation Feedback: Speak confidently and loudly as the app identifies and corrects mispronunciations

+ Real-Time Grammar Help: Get immediate grammar corrections and build better, clearer sentences that helps you improve your grammatical mistakes

+ Multiple Accents: Train your ears and become familiar with diverse global accents and voices from around the world

+ Fun and Engaging: Engage with funny images and relatable examples that help you remember new words easily.

+ Unlimited Practice: Practice conversation as many times as you need to steadily build confidence and reach your desired fluency

 
So, why wait? Download the HalaEnglish now to improve your speaking skills! Join the growing community and become one of the confident speakers in it. Begin your learning English journey now!

 
Connect With Us

Email: hello.halaenglish@gmail.com

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula

Learn Chinese with an amazing dictionary (plus OCR) and flash card system.

trainchinese will teach you Chinese, with a free and complete dictionary, thousands of vocab lists, example sentences, audio recordings, measure words, character animations and Optical Character Recognition — not to mention a powerful flash card training system that even includes handwriting training!

• Our dictionary prioritises commonly-used words and phrases above the obscure and obsolete, while example sentences and measure words (classifiers) provide crucial context to help you decide which Chinese word is the most appropriate translation. Other dictionaries just leave you guessing!

• We've got Optical Character Recognition (OCR) too. Spotted some Chinese you can't read? Capture a photo of some Chinese text from a menu, book or sign, and the app identifies and translates the characters for you.  

• Search for words by part of speech

• Mistyped a word? Helpful spelling suggestions get you to the right results fast.

• Words feature both example sentences and measure words for nouns. It's time to move beyond "个"! And best of all it's all connected: tap examples and measure words to open them as full dictionary entries.

• trainchinese is great for students: it includes more than a thousand vocabulary lists covering topics from International Relations to American Football Teams and more. Feel like something's missing? Users often get in touch to ask for lists on the topics they're studying, and we're happy to oblige! You'll also find lists containing HSK-level words (both old and new standards), plus TOCFL lists for students in Taiwan!

• Highlight words with your finger for super-fast access to character animations, related searches and more!

• Whether you're studying the Simplified (mainland China and Singapore) or Traditional (Hong Kong and Taiwan) variants, we've got you covered! Easily switch between them or choose to display both in dictionary results and on flash cards. Even better, you can use the phonetics you're comfortable with - choose from Pinyin with tone marks, Pinyin with tone numbers or even Zhuyin characters (from the BoPoMoFo system used in Taiwan).

• Create flash cards with audio and animation from dictionary entries. Organise them into lists, and share them with friends (or students).

• Our Spaced Repetition system ensures you'll memorize words for good.

• Train your way: each card is available in four different modes to test different aspects of Chinese study. See Chinese, Pinyin or English and get tested on translation, and even compare your handwriting to a stroke-order animation side-by-side, synchronized! Or if you prefer, there's multiple choice training too (for a real challenge, try it in "Dictation" mode!).

• Flash cards are saved on your device and synchronized with trainchinese.com, where you can also train with them and find more great content.

• Add study notes to your flash cards - they're saved and backed up at trainchinese.com.

Don't forget to check out our other apps (tap our company name in the App Store for more info):

 - Chinese Writer
 - Chinese Audio Trainer
 - Pinyin Trainer
 - Number Trainer
 - Chinese Challenges

Ready to learn and play with fun musical kids games?

CURRICULUM:
Endless Learning Academy includes thousands of progressive lesson modules and delightful interactive learning activities covering:

In addition to the interactive lessons, this app includes hours of video lessons on hundreds of subjects to deepen your child’s early learning across a vast array of subjects including:
- Time & duration (e.g. morning, before, after)
- Colors & shapes (e.g. red, blue, circle)
- Size & weight (e.g. big, small, tall)
- Direction & orientation (e.g. top, bottom, over, under)

- Hobbies (e.g. bicycling, climbing, baking, dancing)

- Feelings (e.g. brave, curious, excited, proud)

description:
Are you looking for an efficient, free, and easy-to-use Chinese learning app? Try Chinesia – Chinese Learning App for Chinese Language Learners!

Come to China and learn Chinese easily and efficiently with students from all over the world! Chinese supports learners of all levels and countries, available in 14 languages, including English, Thai, Japanese, Vietnamese, Indonesian, and more, all for free in core courses! With over 15 years of experience in international language education, Chinesia offers fun and efficient gamified courses to help you learn Chinese listening, speaking, reading, and writing easily and efficiently, allowing you to expand your vocabulary, consolidate grammar, write Chinese characters, and speak fluently in just a few minutes a day, making it easy and efficient to improve your Chinese proficiency!

All Chinese courses are carefully designed by a team of professional teachers, combined with the latest AI technology, providing more than 100 real-life scenarios and 500 high-frequency daily scenarios to practice real-life dialogues, allowing you to practice real-life character dialogues in your studies.

In addition to language learning, Chinese also offers unique cultural courses to help you better understand Chinese culture and society.

Key Features of Chinesia – Your Favorite Chinese Learning App:
● Learn by playing, and it's free! Chinesia's well-designed gamified courses make it easy for you to improve your Chinese language in a fun process.

●The teaching method is simple and efficient, and the authoritative Chinese teacher team has been repeatedly polished, and global users have proven that it meets the best learning memory curve, which can effectively enhance the long-term memory of Chinese learning, and it will be unforgettable once learned!

●Learn together more motivated! Support learning with Chinese enthusiasts around the world, PK on the leaderboard together, and come and prove your learning results!

● Visualization of learning outcomes and rewards for each learning. You can continue to earn rewards and achievements as you learn, as well as level up to earn your own rank badges and titles. The spark check-in mechanism helps you develop a good habit of studying every day and encourages you to keep moving towards your Chinese goals!

●All core Chinese learning courses are free! It also supports Chinese learning for a variety of native speakers, including English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Russian, Vietnamese, Thai, Arabic, Indonesian, Malay, Khmer, Portuguese!

No matter what your current Chinese level is, whether it's daily life, school grades, traveling abroad, work needs, hobbies, or socializing with friends, joining Chinese can benefit from it! Come and experience it!

Available subscription plans:
1 month, 3 months, 12 months

Note:
Payments are made through your App Store account and can be canceled or managed at any time in your account settings.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact: chinesiahelp@gmail.com

Download Chinesia – your favorite Chinese learning app now!

** App Store's Editor's Choice ** 


*From the team at ORIGINATOR - the creators of the beloved Endless Alphabet and Sesame Street's Monster at the End of This Book and Another Monster....  Originator is a team of passionate artists and engineers dedicated to the best education+entertainment apps for kids.*

As a follow-up to Endless Alphabet, set the stage for early reading success with Endless Reader!  This app introduces "sight words", the most commonly used words in school, library, and children's books.  Kids need to recognize these words by sight in order to achieve reading fluency.  Recognizing sight words is advantageous for beginning readers because many of these words have unusual spelling, cannot be sounded out using phonics knowledge, and often cannot be represented using pictures. 

Kids will have a blast learning sight words and their context and usage with the adorable Endless monsters.  Each word features an interactive word puzzle with letters that come alive, and then a sentence puzzle with words that become what they describe.  See the word "dog" as a barking dog, and the word "up" reach for the sky!

** NOTE: You must be online and have sufficient disk space while running the app to get all words in the app. **

Features:
- 6 words free to try with additional word packs available for purchase.
- Delightful animations reinforce sight recognition of words in a fun and interactive way.
- Word puzzles reinforce spelling using lower-case letters and the sentence puzzles teach definition and usage (in addition to sight recognition).
- 3D Touch on iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus makes letters and words react in an extra special way!
- Endless Reader was designed with your children in mind.  There are no high scores, failures, limits or stress.  Your children can interact with the app at their own pace.
